Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Last: Naruto the Movie
Description: Hinata Hyuga's younger sister has been kidnapped, so Naruto must do what he can to save her.

Director.Name: Tsuneo Kobayashi
Director.Bio: Tsuneo Kobayashi was a Japanese anime director affiliated with Pierrot. He was best known as the director of critically acclaimed anime series The Twelve Kingdoms

Title: Schindler/'s List
Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Allan Spielberg is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He began his career in the New Hollywood era, and is currently the most commercially successful director

Title: The Conjuring
Description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

Director.Name: James Wan
Director.Bio: James Wan is an Australian film director, screenwriter, producer, and comic book writer. He has primarily worked in the horror genre as the co-creator of the Saw and Insidious franchises and the creator of The Conjuring Universe.

Title: Insidious 1
Description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

Director.Name: James Wan
Director.Bio: James Wan is an Australian film director, screenwriter, producer, and comic book writer. He has primarily worked in the horror genre as the co-creator of the Saw and Insidious franchises and the creator of The Conjuring Universe.

Title: Lights Out
Description: Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother. Oongaboonga

Director.Name: David F. Sandberg
Director.Bio: David F. Sandberg is a Swedish filmmaker. He is best known for his collective no-budget horror short films under the online pseudonym ponysmasher and for his 2016 directorial debut Lights Out, based on his 2013 acclaimed horror short of the same name.

Title: Hereditary
Description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

Director.Name: Ari Aster
Director.Bio: Ari Aster is an American film director and screenwriter known for Hereditary and Midsommar.

Title: #Home
Description: Oliver Twist (Indrans) wants to be tech-savvy and become a better companion to his two sons who spend more time on their phones than with their loved ones.

Director.Name: Rojin Thomas
Director.Bio: Rojin Thomas is an Indian film director and script writer who works in Malayalam films. He made his directional debut with Philips and the Monkey Pen (2013), directed along with Shanil Muhammed. His second film was Jo and the Boy (2015). Philips and the Monkey Pen won three awards at 2013 Kerala State Film Awards for Best Children/'s Film, Best Child Artist (Master Sanoop) and Best Children/'s Film Director.

Title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
Description: On Halloween 1968, Stella and her two friends meet a mysterious drifter, Ramón, and uncover a sinister notebook of stories.

Director.Name: André Øvredal
Director.Bio: He is best known for writing and directing the film Trollhunter

Title: Blair Witch
Description: After discovering a video showing what he believes to be his vanished sister Heather, James and a group of friends head to the forest believed to be inhabited by the Blair Witch

Director.Name: Adam Wingard
Director.Bio: At 19 Adam got his start in feature film making early with his directorial debut Home Sick, a slasher horror film starring Bill Moseley and Tom Toweles. However it was his second effort at 24 years old with the film Pop Skull that garnered him a talent to watch
